# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#11)

#### Kchan

Can anyone with access to Shadesmar learn how to worldhop?

#### Brandon Sanderson

In theory. Getting to Sel is really tough...
